channel.title: Looking for someone who will explain how to add a area that does somthing
channel.description:
I am looking for someone who will help explain how to make an area where you can fight in but not lose your items when you die.
At the moment i no how to make an area but what do i have to do to make it so you can fight like the wilderness but not lose your items.
If you can please explain i will be very greatful.

item.title: Looking for someone who will explain how to add a area that does somthing
item.dc:creator: @i_ownd_u_i i ownd u i
item.description:
@i_ownd_u_i wrote:

ok this you will need a tut to help you with i have seen on the tut section before but
its really hard to code in go to tut section and see if it is still there and try and code
into you client.java.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for someone who will explain how to add a area that does somthing
